[utils](./README.md) > [Deferred](./Deferred.md)

## Deferred class

Promise wrapper that allows to manipulate it more easily by making and accessible outside the usual callback.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class Deferred<T>
```

## Properties

| Property                         | Type                     | Description           |
| -------------------------------- | ------------------------ | --------------------- |
| [promise](./Deferred.promise.md) | Promise<T>               |                       |
| [reject](./Deferred.reject.md)   | (...args: any[]) => void | Rejects the promise.  |
| [resolve](./Deferred.resolve.md) | (...args: any[]) => void | Resolves the promise. |
